Actions.Text: REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING

Title: Extends provisions of law relating to operational expenses of certain gaming facilities
Summary: Extends provisions of law relating to operational expenses of certain gaming facilities.
LawCode: Amd part I ยง3, Chap 61 of 2017
ActClause: AN ACT to amend part I of chapter 61 of the laws of 2017 amending the tax law relating to operational expenses of certain gaming facilities, in relation to extending the provisions of such part
